text: #AskBQ is BloombergQuint’s daily offering where market experts help investors make the right investment choice — be it in equities, commodities or the derivatives markets.On Wednesday’s episode Gaurang Shah, head market strategist at Geojit Financial Services and Sameet Chavan, chief analyst (technical and derivatives) at Angel Broking gave their views on Aban Offshore, HUDCO, Reliance Capital and many more.
title: #AskBQ: Looking To Invest In Aban Offshore, HUDCO, Reliance Capital? Read This
